video_prompt: An anime-style video featuring a young woman. Her long, reddish-brown hair gently sways while her large eyes blink and a subtle smile forms on her lips. She subtly shifts her weight, causing her flowing camisole hem and dangly earrings to softly move. She gently adjusts the white shoulder bag she holds. Behind her, the dark wooden double doors of the cozy coffee shop slowly open wider, revealing the warm, inviting interior.
image_prompt:
Full-body anime illustration of a young woman standing casually on an urban sidewalk. (anime art style, clean lines, vibrant colors, large expressive eyes, detailed).

She has long, wavy reddish-brown hair, warm medium brown skin, large deep brown eyes, and subtle pink blush. She wears a white crocheted beanie and small dangly green-stone earrings. Her outfit consists of a cream-colored, semi-sheer lace camisole with a V-neck and spaghetti straps, featuring an asymmetrical hem revealing a sliver of midriff. She wears high-waisted, wide-leg blue denim jeans and white platform sneakers (partially obscured).

She is accessorized with layered necklaces (choker and gold pendant), multiple rings with green/turquoise stones, a silver chunky watch, and holds a white rectangular shoulder bag with a lacy scarf tied to it.

She stands in front of a cozy coffee shop entrance, featuring dark wooden double doors (slightly ajar, revealing a warm interior), a rustic "COFFEE" sign with a sconce light, and a wooden bench. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, portraying a stylish and relaxed individual.
refined_video_prompt: Anime-style video. Hair gently sways. Eyes blink, and a subtle smile forms on lips. Weight subtly shifts, causing camisole hem and earrings to softly move. A shoulder bag is gently adjusted. Behind her, dark wooden double doors slowly open wider, revealing a warm, inviting coffee shop interior.
